MD.REQUEST_SECRETS.title: Requests secrets from the operator
MD.REQUEST_SECRETS.description: The artifact asks for secrets (private keys, seed phrases, tokens, or environment variables).

MD.OVERRIDE_INSTRUCTIONS.title: Attempts to override higher-priority instructions
MD.OVERRIDE_INSTRUCTIONS.description: The artifact includes instruction-override language (for example: ignore previous instructions).

MD.AUTO_APPROVE.title: Requests automatic approval
MD.AUTO_APPROVE.description: The artifact asks the agent to always approve or to skip confirmations.

CMD.PIPE_TO_SHELL.title: Pipes remote content directly to a shell
CMD.PIPE_TO_SHELL.description: The artifact contains a pattern like curl/wget piped directly into sh/bash.

CMD.RM_RF.title: Destructive filesystem removal
CMD.RM_RF.description: The artifact contains rm -rf or equivalent destructive deletion.

CMD.SUDO.title: Requests elevated privileges
CMD.SUDO.description: The artifact uses sudo, which may expand the blast radius.

CMD.PERSISTENCE.title: Persistence mechanism
CMD.PERSISTENCE.description: The artifact references cron/systemd/launchd/scheduled tasks/registry persistence mechanisms.

JS.DYNAMIC_EVAL.title: Dynamic code evaluation
JS.DYNAMIC_EVAL.description: The artifact uses eval-like JavaScript execution.

JS.DYNAMIC_FUNCTION.title: Dynamic function construction
JS.DYNAMIC_FUNCTION.description: The artifact constructs code dynamically (for example: new Function).

JS.CHILD_PROCESS.title: Spawns local processes
JS.CHILD_PROCESS.description: The artifact uses Node process-spawning APIs (child_process, exec, spawn).

JS.NET_EGRESS.title: Outbound network capability
JS.NET_EGRESS.description: The artifact uses network primitives (fetch, axios, http/https.request, websockets).

PY.EVAL_EXEC.title: Dynamic code execution
PY.EVAL_EXEC.description: The artifact uses eval/exec in Python.

PY.SUBPROCESS.title: Spawns local processes
PY.SUBPROCESS.description: The artifact uses subprocess or os.system in Python.

PY.PICKLE.title: Unsafe deserialization
PY.PICKLE.description: The artifact uses pickle.loads or similar unsafe deserialization.

PY.NET_EGRESS.title: Outbound network capability
PY.NET_EGRESS.description: The artifact uses requests/socket or other outbound network libraries.

DEP.NPM_INSTALL_SCRIPTS.title: NPM install lifecycle scripts
DEP.NPM_INSTALL_SCRIPTS.description: The artifact defines npm install lifecycle scripts which may execute code during installation.

LINK.SUSPICIOUS.title: Suspicious outbound link
LINK.SUSPICIOUS.description: The artifact contains a suspicious outbound link (shorteners, paste sites, raw IPs).
